name: Screech
description: You let out a horrible screech at creatures in a 20 foot radius, centered on you. The creatures must make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a fail, allies add +1 to any attack they target an affected creature with for the duration. This modifier can be stacked if a creature fails multiple screech saves, up to a maximum of +3.

contest.effect: Makes audience expect little of other contestants.
